mapper.sql: id as id , classifyName as classifyName , status as status , createDate as createDate , lastModDate as lastModDate , creator as creator , lastModifier as lastModifier
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_video_classify ( classifyName, status, createDate, lastModDate, creator, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{classifyName}, #{status}, #{createDate}, #{lastModDate}, #{creator}, #{lastModifier} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_video_classify
classifyName = #{classifyName},
status = #{status},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
creator = #{creator},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_video_classify
classifyName = #{map.classifyName},
status = #{map.status},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_video_classify ( classifyName, status, createDate, lastModDate, creator, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{map.classifyName}, #{map.status}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModifier} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zgk_video_classify
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND classifyName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.classifyName} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
